forum.name: hangout
forum.description: a board to relax and discuss all kinds of miscellaneous topics. welcome!

thread.title: weekly friday meetups ongoing

comments.text: hey everyone! just a reminder that i'm still running weekly friday meetups from around 4pm est to 2am est every friday hoping to get a new record number of concurrent players.
stop by this weekend to help the cause! having spoken to philipp, he's said that there is some easter egg associated with player-counts, so i'd like to find out what it is!
yo, are these meetups still going on? maybe i'll drop by
ill try my best to drop on by!
yep, everything is still happening! i'm trying to come up with some activities or games so it's not just sitting around all night. any suggestions?
ill stop on by. sounds fun :]
arghh rl got in the way, i don't think i'll ve able to come by today... sry :(

thread.latestCommentText: arghh rl got in the way, i don't think i'll ve able to come by today... sry :(
